alert.note: Alert for Crittenden; Union (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 07 at 12:26PM EST until February 13 at 6:27AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana...Kentucky...Illinois... Ohio River at Newburgh Dam Ohio River at Shawneetown ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Kentucky... Ohio River at Mount Vernon .Recent precipitation has caused the Ohio River to rise. The river is forecast to reach flood stage at multiple locations early this week, and will remain above flood stage for the rest of the week. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE SATURDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Shawneetown. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning to early Sunday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM CST Monday the stage was 30.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to a crest of 36.6 feet Friday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 33.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
